input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
CY Graphic Design Limited Quantity Cover Case For ZTE Source N9511 / Majesty Z796C (Include a CYstore Stylus Pen) - Seamless Antique Swirls

Item keywords:
This two pieces snap-on image with rubber coated case makes your cell phone has truly unique style
Special design provides protection from scratches
Unique design allows easy access to all buttons, controls and ports without having to remove the case
Material: Hard plastic image with thin rubber coating
With a very nice CYstore Stylus Pen
Easy to install: Just snap on.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Introducing theCY Graphic Design Limited Quantity Cover Case for ZTE Source N9511 / Majesty Z796C. With its sleek and stylish design, this case is the perfect way to add a touch of personality to your cell phone while also providing protection from scratches and other damages. The two-piece snap-on design makes it easy to install, just snap on and you're done.

The special design of this case allows easy access to all buttons, controls, and ports without having to remove the case, so you can use your phone as usual. The hard plastic image with thin rubber coating ensures that your phone stays protected and the case has a smooth, seamless antique swirls design.

Not only does this case look great, but it also comes with a very nice CYstore Stylus Pen, making it a great value. Don't settle for a boring, plain case when you can have a unique and stylish one that also provides protection for your phone. Order yours today and take your phone style to the next level!
input_text.Response B: This cute turtle design charm pendant is made of alloy and crystal rhinestone. It can be used as a necklace, keychain or charm phone plug. This is a fashion jewelry accessories and a nice gift for your friends. The measurement: approx. 3.5m (H) x 2.0 cm (W) x 1.0cm (D).

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
